alert.note: Alert for Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 3:07AM MST until January 10 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Sawtooth/Stanley Basin, Sun Valley Region, and Wood River Foothills, including but not limited to Stanley, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Galena, Hailey, Bellevue, and Picabo * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing and drifting snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov. 8

area.areaDesc: Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills
